C

Candidate - Class in Unnamed Package
A Candidate represents a candidate in an IR election.
Candidate(String, String) - Constructor for class Candidate
Constructor for a Candidate object, creates a Candidate with specified party name and candidate name.
candidateName - Variable in class Candidate
the candidate's name as a String
candidateParties - Static variable in class POProcessing
an ArrayList of Strings that represents the political parties of candidates candidateParties.get(i corresponds to candidates.get(i).
candidates - Variable in class Ballot
ArrayList of strings that represent the names of the candidates on a ballot
candidates - Static variable in class IRProcessing
an ArrayList of Candidate objects that represents the candidates in the election
candidates - Variable in class Party
Arraylist of strings, name of each candidate in order.
candidates - Static variable in class POProcessing
an ArrayList of Strings that represent the names of candidates.
candidatesBallotCounts - Static variable in class POProcessing
an Array of integers that represents the number of votes each candidate received candidatesBallotCounts[i] corresponds to candidates.get(i).
CandidateTest - Class in Unnamed Package

candidateTypeChecking2() - Method in class CandidateTest

The candidate's name as a String
CandParty - Variable in class IRRow

checkArgs(String[]) - Static method in class main
Checks the command line argument given by the user to get the election information file.
CPLProcessing - Class in Unnamed Package
CPLProcessing.java This file implements a CPLProcessing class that is responsible for handling a CPL election.
